headers.subject: [tosdr:2434] You indemnify Skype

html:
12.7 If any third party brings a claim against Skype in connection with, or arising out of (i) your breach of these Terms; (ii) your breach of any applicable law of regulation; (iii) your infringement or violation of the rights of any third parties (including intellectual property rights); (iv) your User Submissions or (v) your complaint in relation to any User Submission, you will indemnify and hold Skype harmless from and against all damages, liability, loss, costs and expenses (including reasonable legal fees and costs) related to such claim.

http://www.skype.com/en/legal/tou/

Still not sure exactly what to make of these clauses, but I'm posting it here for discussion. 

--

subject: You indemnify Skype
text:
>
> *12.7* If any third party brings a claim against Skype in connection 
> with, or arising out of (i) your breach of these Terms; (ii) your breach of 
> any applicable law of regulation; (iii) your infringement or violation of 
> the rights of any third parties (including intellectual property rights); 
> (iv) your User Submissions or (v) your complaint in relation to any User 
> Submission, you will indemnify and hold Skype harmless from and against all 
> damages, liability, loss, costs and expenses (including reasonable legal 
> fees and costs) related to such claim.


http://www.skype.com/en/legal/tou/

Still not sure exactly what to make of these clauses, but I'm posting it
